articles.title: Drake Maye is excited by his next prime time opportunity
articles.description:
"That's what we're trying to play for many years down the road. Trying to be the team that people want to see at night, and people want to see when the only game on is us."

articles.title: Julian Edelman believes this young Patriots team isn’t there yet
articles.description:

articles.title: Stefon Diggs admits to ‘adjusting’ to varying playing time with Patriots

articles.title: What Brad Stevens said of Celtics’ trade deadline plans
